Title: Breaking the transmission barriers in ultra-broadband high-capacity optical fiber transmission systems
Abstract: © 2018 The Author(s)The limitations and practicalities in design of ultra-high-capacity optical transmission systems with transmission bandwidth beyond C+L EDFA are described, together with a deep theoretical understanding of each noise source contribution limiting the overall data throughput.
